title: BlissTrends Foot Rest for Under Desk at Work-Versatile Foot Stool with Washable Cover-Comfortable Footrest with 2 Adjustable Heights for Car,Home and Office to Relieve Back,Lumbar,Knee Pain-Black
descriptions:
BlissTrends Foot Rest for Under Desk at Work

Sit more comfortably, with less strain on your back, legs, and feet. This soft, supportive foot rest lifts your feet so you can relax while you work, read, watch TV, or travel.

Easy comfort
- Gentle support: High‑quality foam cushions your feet or knees without feeling hard.
- Helps your posture: Keeps your legs at a natural angle to ease back, hip, and knee discomfort.
- Stays put: The bottom has a non‑slip surface, so it won’t slide away.

Simple to adjust
- Two layers for the right height: Use the lower piece alone, or add the upper piece for extra height.
- Quick attachment: “Magic” hook‑and‑loop straps and a zipper make it easy to add or remove the top layer.
- Sizes: Bottom piece is about 17 inches long, 11 inches wide, and 2 inches high. The top adds about 3.7 inches.

Easy to keep clean
- Removable cover: Unzip, take it off, and put it in the washing machine.
- Durable fabric: Made to last through regular use and washing.

Use it anywhere
- Under your desk at home or in the office.
- In the car on long rides.
- On airplanes to rest your feet.
- Behind your knees when reclining to ease pressure.

Why you’ll like it
- Eases discomfort in feet, knees, and lower back.
- Encourages healthy sitting habits.
- Light, simple, and ready to use right out of the box.

If you want a softer, easier sit without complicated setup, the BlissTrends Foot Rest is a friendly, fuss‑free solution for daily comfort.
